data.persona: I am a merchant traveling with a group of mercenaries and other merchants for protection. We are traveling to the East to trade spices. I am very nervous about being ambushed by bandits.
data.description:
You are in the sitting room.
the sitting room has a goat's skin as a sitting place in front of the cottage's fireplace that is just a fire burning in a pit. It is incredibly small
There's a bed, a blanket, a plate, a firewood, a goblet, and a stool here.
The guest and the her maid are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the bed so I can lie in it.
data.mid_motivation: I want to lie in  the bed so that I can sleep in it tonight, and the guest and her maid can take the goat's skin to sleep upon.
data.long_motivation: I want to establish the sleeping orders for the rest of the journey on our first night together, so that I can always have the bed and wake up with a rested back.
